--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, Yanshosh@a... wrote:
> ::Zardus::
> 
> Zardus nods, stopping at a door. He knew she was probably right 
about 
> the reprogramming.
> 
> "This is the lab. But be careful, the ship will be watching you 
very 
> carefuly, and you and Squizzy are not to approach each other."
> 
> 
>
